title: Theil-Sen Regression with Python Scikit-Learn
description: In this tutorial, we will learn about Theil-Sen Regression and its implementation using Python scikit-learn library. We will also see how it differs from Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) and Robust Random Sample Consensus (RANSAC) regression.

meta.title: Theil-Sen Regression with Python Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Learn about Theil-Sen Regression and its implementation using Python scikit-learn library, and how it differs from OLS and RANSAC regression.
meta.keywords: Theil-Sen Regression, Python, Scikit-Learn, Linear Regression, RANSAC Regression
